long_description: Southern California is a paradise for hikers, offering stunning vistas and diverse landscapes-from Death Valley to the Central Coast! Author: Allen Riedel. Softcover; 255 pages; color photographs and maps. The Mountaineers Books; copyright 2008. Topographical maps, elevation profiles, full-color photos and hikes-at-a-glance chart help you find the perfect hike easily and quickly. Features more than 100 full-color photographs, maps and trail profiles.
short_description: Southern California is a paradise for hikers, offering stunning vistas and diverse landscapes-from Death Valley to the Central Coast!
